content.description: Directions: The following question(s) refer to the diagram below, which shows 100 ml of water being poured through a soil sample. After the water has passed through the soil, 98 ml of water is measured in the collection tray below the sample.
content.question: Of the following, which is the most likely composition of the soil sample?

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how environmental concepts and processes represented visually relate to broader environmental issues.
